facebook.title: Risk of human-triggered earthquakes laid out in biggest-ever database
facebook.summary: The Human-Induced Earthquake Database, or HiQuake, contains 728 examples of earthquakes (or sequences of earthquakes) that may have been set off by humans over the past 149 years.
